name: Tapu Lele
description: This guardian deity of Akala is guilelessly cruel. The fragrant aroma of flowers is the source of its energy.

abilities.name: Psychic Surge
abilities.effect: When this Pokémon enters battle, it changes the terrain to psychic terrain.
abilities.description: Turns the ground into Psychic Terrain when the Pokémon enters a battle.

abilities.name: Telepathy
abilities.effect: This Pokémon does not take damage from friendly Pokémon's moves, including single-target moves aimed at it.
abilities.description: Anticipates an ally’s attack and dodges it.
